subject: Playoff Games
Football
lead_paragraph: That the Giants (7-6), with losses to free agency and injuries, would lead the N.F.C. East and control their playoff possibilities might have seemed improbable a few weeks ago.
snippet: That the Giants (7-6), with losses to free agency and injuries, would lead the N.F.C. East and control their playoff possibilities might have seemed improbable a few weeks ago.
